google_reviews.author: Brenda Sherrer
google_reviews.review:
I've been extremely pleased with how fast my maintenance problems have been taken care of plus Joel has also gone above and  beyond on several small things I needed help on and didn't have the strength to do. Thank you Joel.

Jackie is the best manager I have had in Bellingham.  I've been here several years and seen her improve on many areas in the complex. I also realize that there may be many behind the scenes things in a 3 story plus large grounds facility that we do not understand or know about and how they need to be handled. Thank you Jackie.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We love having you and Lily here.  We will keep up the good work!

google_reviews.author: Peggy Manatad
google_reviews.review: The property to look wonderful even in the midst of fall with lots of leaves. But obviously well taken care of. The manager was friendly and she took her time when touring us with the property. She showed all the amenities and they were awesome. Their calendar had lots of activities on. It. Was a great experience

owner_response.text:
Hi Peggy, Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We appreciate the time you took to give us a rating and your comments.  We hope to see your friend soon!
Take care,
Jackie

google_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn
google_reviews.review: I don't recommend any place where a manger/owner allows there maintenance man too block delivery drivers in for 45 minutes because the delivery driver parked in a employee parking spot too help a resident of there's carry up 8 bags of groceries to the third floor cause this place offers no help or carts for there seniors. That type of kid behavior isn't where I would want any family of mine or my worst enemy. They have a lot of growing up too do it seems. Very sad and disgusting behavior considering it's a facility for our elderly.

owner_response.text:
I apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced regarding parking in our community. To ensure a smoother experience, I invite you to visit our leasing office so we can review our parking policies for service providers who assist residents with tasks such as grocery delivery.

We have numerous service providers who support our residents, and typically, adherence to standard parking regulations ensures a seamless process. It's important for each service provider to supply their own equipment necessary for their services.

By discussing our parking guidelines together, we aim to prevent any future misunderstandings and ensure compliance with our community's rules. Your cooperation is appreciated, and we look forward to resolving this matter amicably.

google_reviews.author: Sandra Sowada
google_reviews.review: I met with Jackie and she explained the apartment application process in clear understandable language but also with warmth and clarity about the property and how living at Vintage might be for me. On the tour she showed me everything and every where, even the trash room (which was clean and freshly scrubbed). When we passed other residents they greeted each other and it was evident Jackie has a great relationship with them. The building is in excellent shape even taking in its age; No obvious wear and tear or deferred maintenance. I am looking forward to a future with my dog living at Vintage Bellingham.

owner_response.text: Thank you Sandra for the 5 star review!  We look forward to having you be part of our community!

google_reviews.author: LER
google_reviews.review: Jackie, the Community Director, gave me a wonderful tour of the apartment amenities and property  this week.  She was very welcoming and informative . The property is very clean and well-maintained so I would feel safe living there. There are  also lots of fun activities to join in on.  Very good impression...

owner_response.text:
Hi Lynn,
Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

google_reviews.author: Ronita Phillips
google_reviews.review: We were looking for a 1 bedroom for my mother. During the tour, Jackie, the Community Director, was very friendly and helpful. She explained the application process thoroughly and was extremely patient with my mother. It was a great experience.

owner_response.text: We are sincerely grateful for your wonderful feedback and thrilled to hear that Jackie was able to assist you so effectively in finding a suitable 1 bedroom place for your mother. It is always our aim to provide thorough explanations of our processes and be patient with all individuals involved. Thank you once again, we're delighted we could make it a great experience for you and your mother.

google_reviews.author: Christine Bickel
google_reviews.review: The manager, Jackie, is great and made the application/move in process for my dad super easy! I'm so happy he'll be living at Vintage at Bellingham - the building is clean and well maintained, the grounds are beautiful, and it's convenient for his needs.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the 5 Star review!  It is so nice to have your dad here.  If he needs anything, we are here for him!

google_reviews.author: Anne Steirer
google_reviews.review: Im grateful to live in my quiet, safe and clean building, thanks to the careful attention to details by Jackie, our marvelous, calm, caring and efficient Community Director. The experienced maintenance crew work to care for the indoors as well as the outdoor lawn, flowers and trees during every season. Friendly, interesting tenants daily enjoy a variety of active or quiet pursuits. Meet them at coffee hour, bingo, dominoes, card games, pool table, WII bowling, movies, books, puzzles and Seahawks pep rallies.

owner_response.text: Hi Anne,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We do the best we can.  Thank you for being such a wonderful resident!

google_reviews.author: Jaw Breaker
google_reviews.review: Ill mannered and always cranky manager and her cronies who are also biggest jerk i have encountered in any old folk places, Awful management and who knows what else happens here and how the elderly who live here are treated.

owner_response.text: We take all feedback very seriously, and we appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention. We are sorry to hear about your negative experience. We strive to provide a positive and supportive environment for all our residents, and we are concerned to hear that this has not been your experience. We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns in more detail so we can understand what happened and take appropriate action. Please contact us directly at vintagebellingham.cd@fpimgt.com so we can schedule a time to talk.

google_reviews.author: Barb Clark
google_reviews.review:
I moved in iNov
Absolutely love it
Everyone so friendly and Jackie (manage ) is wonderful!
I feel so safe and comfortable here!
Iy is so quiet
Lots of activites
The grounds and indoors are kept beautiful

Do wish had a little dog park
Are dog walking areas but wish could turn loose to run and play

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Barb!  We try very hard to make sure you and the rest of our residents are well taken care of.

yelp_reviews.author: Leslie W.
yelp_reviews.review: I have lived at the Vintage in Bellingham for the last five years and love it. Jackie our manager is great and David our maintenance guy is helpful to us old folks :) The apartments are very nice and the grounds lovely. I have made some great friends and that is important as you age and need to rely on others more often, we are all in the same boat!

owner_response.text: Thank you for the 5-star review, Leslie!  We love having you at the Vintage at Bellingham.  We are thrilled that you appreciate us.

summary.text:
Good

The Vintage at Bellingham is often praised for its exceptionally warm and welcoming community atmosphere. A significant number of user reviews highlight the friendliness and competence of Jackie, the Community Director, who has been instrumental in creating a positive environment. Many residents appreciate how Jackie takes the time to explain the application process clearly and warmly, leaving a lasting impression from the very first encounter. Additionally, the overall cleanliness and upkeep of the building and grounds are frequently noted, suggesting effective management practices are in place to maintain these standards.

Maintenance at Vintage at Bellingham is another aspect where the property management shines. Multiple residents have testified to their maintenance requests being handled in a timely and efficient manner. Joel, a maintenance employee mentioned in one of the reviews, is specifically commended for his dedication in assisting residents beyond their usual tasks. Such attention to personalized service is a consistent theme in the property's feedback and enhances the living experience for its tenants.

Great

The community environment at Vintage at Bellingham is celebrated for fostering friendships and providing a variety of social activities. Those who have lived there for years, such as one user who has been a resident for five years, express immense satisfaction with the social opportunities available. The property offers numerous organized activities like coffee hours, bingo, and even Seahawks pep rallies, creating an active and engaging living environment for its residents.

Tour experiences at Vintage at Bellingham receive high marks, with reviewers detailing positive and thorough walk-throughs. Jackie, noted repeatedly for her welcoming nature, ensures prospective tenants gain insight into all the amenities, such as clean common areas and beautiful outdoor spaces. The level of care shown in these initial interactions helps prospective residents feel assured that Vintage at Bellingham is well-suited to meet their needs.

Bad

Not all experiences at Vintage at Bellingham have been positive, with some user reviews pointing out shortcomings in customer service. One review describes an unfortunate incident where a maintenance worker blocked a delivery driver for improperly parking. This situation was not handled smoothly, causing frustration and highlighting a potential area for improvement in communication and customer service, particularly concerning the needs of the elderly tenants.

This specific incident indicates an opportunity for management to address and improve protocols for handling parking and service provider interactions. Additionally, there appears to be a lack of equipment, such as carts for assisting residents in carrying groceries, which could improve convenience and alleviate the burden for seniors living at Vintage.

Ugly

There are notably critical reviews concerning the attitudes of management and staff at Vintage at Bellingham. A few user reviews describe encounters with staff members that were perceived as dismissive or unfriendly, which is particularly troubling in a community designed for the elderly who may rely more heavily on supportive services. These interactions, described as "cranky" and "ill-mannered," stand in stark contrast to the predominantly positive feedback, indicating room for improvement in consistent customer service standards.

While the majority of the reviews are positive, these isolated negative interactions suggest that achieving uniform excellence in service remains a challenge. Addressing these concerns promptly could help mitigate any potential impact on the community's overall reputation. Management's response to such critical feedback has been to invite further discussion, demonstrating a willingness to resolve issues, which will hopefully lead to improvements in the future.
